channel.title: Nvidia investment on FinanClub

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:14 Chances: SoundHound AI has reported a substantial year-over-year revenue increase of 47% in FY 2023, indicating strong growth potential. The company’s investment from Nvidia in voice AI and speech recognition technology shows confidence in their product and future prospects. SoundHound AI’s focus on voice artificial intelligence aligns with the current trend and growing adoption of AI technology.
